name: Frenzy Extinction
summary: The Frenzy Virus has mutated. Now, you and your team must defeat hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction! Survive waves of mutated monsters as your team upgrades their gear, powers up with custom abilities, and races to extract after defeating the elite bosses. Using physics-based combat and dismemberment, take on tons of maps with 50+ unique weapons.
